merchant_order_id.description: Jet's unique ID for a given merchant order

order_item_id.description:
Jet's unique identifier for an item in a merchant order

                    #Logic

                    required if cancelling only part of an order and separate shipments were not defined, if an alt_order_item_id has been associated with the order_item_id via the order accept message that may be passed instead.

alt_order_item_id.description:
Optional seller supplied ID for an item in an order.

                    #Logic

                    required if cancelling only part of an order and separate shipments were not defined, if an alt_order_item_id has been associated with the order_item_id via the order accept message this may be passed instead of the order_item_id field.

order_cancel_qty.description:
Quanitity of the given item that should be cancelled

                    #Logic

                    Required if cancelling a specific item to indicate the qty of the given item to be cancelled

shipment_id.description:
Jet's unique ID for a given shipment

                    #Logic

                    Include if cancelling only part of an order and separte shipments were defined if an alt_shipment_id has been associated with the shipment_id via the order accept message that may be passed instead.

shipment_item_id.description:
Jet's unique identifier for an item in a shipment

                    #Logic

                    Required if cancelling only part of a shipment and separate shipments were defined if an alt_shipment_item_id has been associated with the shipment_item_id via the order accept message that may be passed instead.

alt_shipment_item_id.description: Optional seller supplied ID for an item in a specific shipment.

shipment_cancel_qty.description:
Quanitity of the given item that should be cancelled

                    #Logic

                    Required if cancelling a specific item to indicate the qty of the given item to be cancelled
